channel.title: Problem with NPC Drops
channel.description:
Guys, I edit the npc drops file, but all they drop is charms... like i wanna edit it, i save, compile... nothing happens, still the same drops.. What do i doo? :l
My NPCDropCFG looks like this : [img]http://www.bildites.lv/images/n72tx09hneo97zou318s.bmp[/img]

item.title: Problem with NPC Drops
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Str mage123:

Owh okk, I get it, Its really wierd but I get it

For future reference, you should not handle your drops that way, ever. Mostly because that will take a LOT of code to make each npc drop each thing and so on…
Look into fixing your drop system or find a new one…

Read full topic

item.title: Problem with NPC Drops
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Str mage123:

Ok, i went there but its wierd to, when I write tormented demons NPC id, it shows up like this http://www.bildites.lv/images/6hntfhyta0tv9olzgbjm.bmp

That looks like the method to return the attack, or death, animations…
Not what you want. don’t search for the npc ids in that file…
What runescape sucks is talking about, is this:

[code=java] if (npcs[i].npcType > 0) {
int random2 = Misc.random(8);
if (random2 == 4) {
Server.itemHandler.createGroundItem(c, 12158, npcs[i].absX,
npcs[i].absY, 1, c.playerId);
}
if (random2 == 3) {
Server.itemHandler.createGroundItem(c, 12159, npcs[i].absX,
npcs[i].absY, 1, c.playerId);
}
if (random2 == 2) {
Server.itemHandler.createGroundItem(c, 12160, npcs[i].absX,
npcs[i].absY, 1, c.playerId);
}

			if (random2 == 1) {
				Server.itemHandler.createGroundItem(c, 12163, npcs[i].absX,
						npcs[i].absY, 1, c.playerId);
			}
		}[/code]

This code, picks a random int from 0-8. And if it’s 1, 2, 3, or 4, it drops a charm. anything else, it ignores.
Personally I’d have used a switch statement but that’s not the point here.

Read full topic

I dont edit on Word, I edit on ++… I just opened this up in word to take a pic.
Like I know obvlsy that npc 1 is a man, and 995 are coins. well i tried to change that to like ags, just to try, but nothing happens… and even tho it was on 995 ONLY, the npc drop charms too…
I dont understand this… :l
